Class WeakAuthenticationScanner

java.lang.Object

      org.zaproxy.zap.extension.pscan.scanner.WeakAuthenticationScanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
PassiveScanner
public class WeakAuthenticationScanner
extends PluginPassiveScanner

a passive scanner that checks for the use of weak authentication methods such as Basic Authentication and Digest Authentication
